
```{r}
#| output: asis
photos <- filter_flickr_photo(seleccion = c("Boulevar 5 de Julio", "Bella Vista", "Have a yellow day!", "Plaza República")) |>
    pull_flickr_preview()

cat(sprintf("<center>\n%s\n<br/>\n%s<br/></center>", 
         photos$paths, photos$captions))
```

## Imágenes de Maracaibo

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true

gphotos <- filter_ggl_photo(description = "Maracaibo", 
  album_name = "Lugares - Sur América") |>
  pull_ggle_paths_captions()
pixgallery(gphotos$paths, caption=gphotos$captions)
```

## Más imágenes de Maracaibo
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
paths <- sprintf("http://i.imgur.com/%s.jpg?1",
c("BO7Hzhx", "jFlMDBE"))
captions <- sprintf("Imágen por <a href='https://i.imgur.com/%s.jpg' target='imgur'>NeoMapas @ imgur</a>",  c("BO7Hzhx", "jFlMDBE"))
pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)
```
